item.title: Kubernetes
item.author: thqnhat@outlook.com (Nhat Tong)
item.description: Set the kubectl cluster data KUBERNETES_PUBLIC_ADDRESS=3.81.31.12 kubectl config set-cluster kubernetes-the-hard-way \ --certificate-authority=ca.pem \ --embed-certs=true \ --server=https://${KUBERNETES_PUBLIC_ADDRESS}:6443 Set the credentials for kubectl kubectl config set-credentials admin \ --client-certificate=admin.pem \ --client-key=admin-key.pem Set the context for the cluster kubectl config set-context kubernetes-the-hard-way \ --cluster=kubernetes-the-hard-way \ --user=admin Use the new context created kubectl config use-context kubernetes-the-hard-way
